Macro LOOP

An extension to loop is added providing the capability to loop over key and/or data values from a database. The syntax is 

    for-as-db::= var [type-spec] being {each | the}  
                 {{db-key | db-keys} {in | of} DB
                  {[using (db-value other-var)] |
                   [using (transaction txn-var)]}* |
                  {db-value | db-values} {in | of} DB
                  {[using (db-key other-var)] |
                   [using (transaction txn-var)]}*}
where for-as-db is added to for-as-subclause [see the entry for loop in the Common Lisp HyperSpec or ANSI standard]
